title: The Dimensions in Time
dialogue_disasters: I should be taking it easy, not bounding around like some Megaluthian Slimeskimmer.

continuity_notes.name: The Rani
continuity_notes.description: A renegade Time Lord who attempts to trap the Doctor and his companion in a collapsing time trap.
continuity_notes.current_status: Attempting to control evolution using a computer with genetic codes and brain patterns.

continuity_notes.name: The Fourth Doctor
continuity_notes.description: One of the Doctor's incarnations, appearing with Romana and K-9.
continuity_notes.current_status: Trapped in the Rani's time trap, experiencing shifting perspectives.

continuity_notes.name: Romana
continuity_notes.description: The Doctor's Time Lord companion, kidnapped by the Rani.
continuity_notes.current_status: Kidnapped, adding a second 'time brain' to the Rani's computer.

continuity_notes.name: K-9
continuity_notes.description: The Doctor's robotic dog companion, indicating the presence of the Fourth Doctor and Romana.
continuity_notes.current_status: Present with the Fourth Doctor and Romana.

continuity_notes.name: Captain Yates
continuity_notes.description: Former UNIT officer, seen driving Bessie in a hallucination.

continuity_notes.name: Bessie
continuity_notes.description: The Third Doctor's yellow vintage car.
continuity_notes.current_status: Appearing in a hallucination driven by Captain Yates.

continuity_notes.name: The Sixth Doctor
continuity_notes.description: One of the Doctor's incarnations, seen meeting the Brigadier and Susan in a hallucination.

continuity_notes.name: The Brigadier
continuity_notes.description: Longtime ally of the Doctor and former head of UNIT.
continuity_notes.current_status: Appearing in a hallucination with the Sixth Doctor.

continuity_notes.name: Susan
continuity_notes.description: The Doctor's granddaughter, seen as middle-aged in a hallucination.
continuity_notes.current_status: Appearing as middle-aged in the Doctor's memories.

continuity_notes.name: Leela
continuity_notes.description: Former companion of the Fourth Doctor, known for her primitive background.
continuity_notes.current_status: Appearing in a hallucination, understanding complex vocabulary.

continuity_notes.name: Cyberman
continuity_notes.description: Cybernetic beings, enemies of the Doctor.
continuity_notes.current_status: Part of the Rani's cloned menagerie.

continuity_notes.name: Ogron
continuity_notes.description: Brutish humanoid species often employed as mercenaries.
continuity_notes.current_status: Part of the Rani's cloned menagerie.

continuity_notes.name: Prydonian Time Lord
continuity_notes.description: A Time Lord from the Prydonian Chapter of Gallifrey.
continuity_notes.current_status: Part of the Rani's cloned menagerie.

locations.name: East London
locations.description: A 'dreary backwater' three miles from the Cutty Sark site.
locations.current_status: Trapped in a time loop of 1973, 1993, and 2013.

additional_notes: This was a Children in Need Special, aired in two 8-minute episodes. It was also filmed in 3D.
